verses.name: Leviticus 14:45
verses.text: And he shall break down the house, the stones of it, and the timber thereof, and all the morter of the house; and he shall carry them forth out of the city into an unclean place.

verses.name: Leviticus 14:46
verses.text: Moreover he that goeth into the house all the while that it is shut up shall be unclean until the even.

verses.name: Leviticus 14:47
verses.text: And he that lieth in the house shall wash his clothes; and he that eateth in the house shall wash his clothes.
